description: Provide seamless integration with Clockify's time tracking API through a comprehensive set of MCP tools. Manage workspaces, users, projects, tasks, time entries, tags, reports, user groups, and custom fields efficiently. Enable AI assistants and automation workflows to interact with Clockify data securely and effectively.

capabilities.name: get_workspaces
capabilities.description: Get all workspaces for the authenticated user

capabilities.name: get_workspace
capabilities.description: Get details of a specific workspace

capabilities.name: get_user
capabilities.description: Get information about the authenticated user

capabilities.name: get_users
capabilities.description: Get all users in a workspace

capabilities.name: get_clients
capabilities.description: Get all clients in a workspace

capabilities.name: get_projects
capabilities.description: Get all projects in a workspace

capabilities.name: get_tasks
capabilities.description: Get all tasks for a project

capabilities.name: get_time_entries
capabilities.description: Get time entries for a user

capabilities.name: start_timer
capabilities.description: Start a timer (create a running time entry)

capabilities.name: get_tags
capabilities.description: Get all tags in a workspace

capabilities.name: test_clockify_connection
capabilities.description: Test connection to Clockify API and get user information
